title: Unseen Pics Of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Getting Cozy With Hollywood Stars
text:
Posted by: Priyanka Prasad Published: Tuesday, October 13, 2015, 18:39 [IST] 
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan is a global icon who is equally famous in India and abroad. There may be many actors like her; Shahrukh Khan, Amitabh Bachchan, Irrfan Khan and Priyanka Chopra, to name a few who have found a foot holding in Hollywood, but none like Aishwarya.She has not only been representing the L'Oreal brand for years now, but has also starred in many big Hollywood films like The Pink Panther 2 and The Last Legion , thereby finding a foot holding in the international film industry much before anyone else could do it.Over the years, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has managed to turn her name into a brand, she is known across the world for her beauty, grace, intelligence and talent. 
Deep In Love: See What Unthinkable Thing Ranveer Singh Did For Deepika Padukone! With her recent comeback movie, Jazbaa, Aishwarya proved how she still rules the hearts of billion people in spite of taking a 5 year break from work.During her work break, she continued to make Hollywood appearances and ended up bonding with a lot of celebrities. The previous Cannes Film Festival saw the actress getting big time friendly with Eva Longoria, like they were long lost sisters.Check out the below pictures of the actress so that you know how many Hollywood star buddies she has.
